name: Spring Jumps!
description:
So what comes forth after the thaw you might say? Spring! A simple game with a green and springy environment!

This project was made by using Mixamo Animations, blended with my own ninja character. All models are made by me except for the small jumpy clouds.
Textures are made in Quixel Mixer.
Models are made in Blender.
Game is made in Unreal Engine 4.
